featured.text: I remember just a blizzard of paper.

definition.zh_def: 暴風雪：伴隨著強風和大量降雪的極端天氣現象。
definition.en_def: A blizzard is a severe snowstorm characterized by strong sustained winds and low visibility due to falling or blowing snow.
definition.example: The blizzard made it impossible to drive safely on the roads.
